IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.save_select_character_title') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.save_select_character_title GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.save_select_character_title @character_id dbo.id_t, @select_title_code dbo.code_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Characters SET select_title_code = @select_title_code WHERE id = @character_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
